title: Jana Sevana Launches Million Houses tomorrow
content: The Jana Sevana Housing Development Project aimed to construct one million houses will commence tomorrow under the Chairmanship of President Mahinda Rajapakse at Mihindupura Housing Project in Kirulapana. 60 thousand of these houses will be constructed during this year. The Minister of Engineering, Housing Construction and Common Amenities Mr. Wimal Weerawansa disclosed this when a…
